Author: CuddlyDollop
Text: My scale has the option to show kilos and pounds, I usually use kilos. One day I stepped on the scale and it said 120. For a solid 15 seconds I just stared the number like omg my binge has totally fucked me up this time. Then it hit me, no I didn't double my ass overnight, just looking at pounds instead of kilos. Still scary ðŸ˜…
